elements.title: I was faced with so many new things. The first few weeks of my apprenticeship weren't easy for me.

elements.title: I struggled at first. I no longer had any free afternoons. I had less time for my hobby.
elements.correctAnswer: Initially, I struggled with the fact that there were no more free afternoons and I therefore had less time for my hobby.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Overall: my apprenticeship is more strenuous than my time at school. Many new tasks at the training company; quite high demands at the vocational college, less free time.
elements.correctAnswer: Overall, the apprenticeship is more strenuous for me than my time at school. The reasons for this are the many new tasks at the training company, the quite high demands at the vocational college and less free time.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: I like the teaching very much, I'm proud of my perseverance. Now used to the new rhythm after a few months.
elements.correctAnswer: After a few months, I have now got used to the new rhythm. I really like the apprenticeship and I'm proud that I've stuck with it.
